title: Sailing for beginners
brief_description: Instruction on dinghy sailing. Describes the main parts of a boat and her rigging, and explains and demonstrates various manoeuvres including going about, beating to windward, running, gybing, sailing triangular and figure of eight courses, and picking up a man overboard. Slow motion and diagrams are used. Filmed at Burnham-on-Crouch with the cooperation of the Royal Corinthian Yacht Club.
